author: @callistazaraaurelia5609
text: Miracle Queen sends out a swarm of bees whose stings brainwash their victims. She summons all the temporary Miraculous holders, revealing their identities. Ladybug uses the Dragon Miraculous to unify into "Dragon Bug", and recovers the Snake Miraculous for Cat Noir to unify into "Snake Noir". Together, they battle their brainwashed allies and defeat Miracle Queen. Master Fu, as a turtle hero named "Jade Turtle" and being at Hawk Moth and Mayura's mercy, sacrifices his memories, formally transferring the title of Guardian of the Miraculous to Ladybug, who recovers the Miracle Box. ChloÃ© is expelled from the superhero team, and she refuses to forgive Ladybug. In the aftermath, Fu reunites with Marianne, and the two leave Paris. Marinette and Adrien start dating Luka and Kagami, while Nathalie recovers Fu's tablet, which contains the decrypted spellbook.

IM OBSESSED AND WILL NEVER LIVE A DAY WITHOUT PLAYING THIS SONG ATLEAST 10 TIMES A DAY OR EVEN MORE. I FEEL REALLY BAD FOR PEOPLE THAT DONT KNOW SUCH A SONG AND VERSE LIKE TEN, KUN AND XIAOJUN EXISTS. ANYTHING U REALLY WISH FOR WILL BE GRANTED TO U AFTER LISTENING TO THIS SONG GREAT PEOPLE WILL START COMING INTO YOUR LIFE YOULL ACHIEVE ANYTHING YOUVE BEEN GRIEVING FOR I SWEAR YOUR LIFE WILL BE CHANGED FOREVER AND I TRULY MEAN IT WITH MY WHOLE HEART. PLEASE SHARE AND RECOMMEND THIS SONG TO AS MANY PEOPLE AS YOU CAN YOU WILL CHANGE THEIR LIVES. YOULL BE CALLED A HERO, A LIFE CHANGER AND A LIFE SAVER YOULL BE CALLED THE HERO YOUVE ALWAYS DREAMT OF AS A KID THEYLL THANK YOU FOR DAYS THEYLL THANK YOU FOR BLESSING THEIR EYES AND EARS WITH SUCH A WONDERFUL, MAGESTIC, LIFE CHANGING, BEAUTIFUL, ASTONISHING, MELODIC, STUNNING, LOVELY AND SWEET SOUNDING SONG AND VIDEO. text: There is a company in mainland China that has its trainees cover this song.  Many Chinese people don't know Wayv anymore because SM did not promote them in China these years.  Fans of the cover group also abused WayV, said they are not famous in China. I am angry. Obviously, it is such a talented group, but SM wasted their youth.  Ten has been in SM for ten years, and I feel that he didn't get what he deserved.  Hope he will win the prize one day.

text: I think this kind of concept should be the  main concept for WayVâ€™s tittle tracks. These kind of songs are sooooo WayV that thinking of some other group that can actually perform these tracks is so difficult almost impossible. And actually having this as their main concept and kind of song would help to get more fans into WayV and NCT cuz many people wrongly think that their music is just â€œnoisyâ€ when the real fans know it is not like that. They have a vast variety of songs from ballads to hip hop, itâ€™s just amazing how versatile they are slaying in every genre of music. But still I would like to see WayV with this as their main concept cuz it makes noticeable why WayV is so different and unique. text:
Iâ€˜m just comming back to say what everyone here probably has go say too, but it canâ€˜t be said enough.
Gosh this song and WayV deserve so much more. This has been my favourite track from Universe (just like last time it was Nectar)
Itâ€˜s still on my Spotify On Replay ever since it out. 
Also every single one of them is so talented, they all stand out in their unqiue distinct ways, every member is strong on their own, and as a group they always striked me to be very well balanced (and yes very crazy too! hahaha) 
Itâ€˜s been so fun seeing them grow since their Debut with all the variety shows, and it makes me sad due to many events (which I wonâ€˜t be specifically mentioning on here) that they couldnâ€˜t get a comback as OT7 again.
I hope SM has some big plans for these boys in 2022, because they deserve the world<3

Also I know itâ€˜s not the lyrics but I still canâ€˜t stop hearing Hendery say around 0:50 Really I just want a B**ch, tryna feel alive

author: @msb5775
text:
My ranking of WayVâ€™s English:

Ten and Yang Yang: completely fluent and confident without many grammar mistakes

Xiaojun and Hendery: seem pretty fluent but weâ€™ve never really seen them have conversations, just bits and pieces in livestreams and such

Winwin: seems like he understands almost everything in English. He can also speak basic English with confidence (like when he and Hendery had the conversation about being prince-like and whoâ€™s the best cook on winformation) but probably not hold a conversation.

Lucas: afaik heâ€™s never actually spoken English on camera except for small phrases here and there. But I think he understands a lot of English since he says random stuff in English all the time (oh YOU are nana???). Itâ€™s unclear how much he speaks

Kun: still unclear because I donâ€™t think heâ€™s spoken in English on camera either. But Iâ€™m guessing he doesnâ€™t understand completely because of things heâ€™s said in the past (how he only understood part of the lyrics for love talk, how he thought his song title was â€œslaplessâ€ instead of â€œsleeplessâ€)

author: @Papalapotato
text: This Song gives me 2000's Fuck boi anthem, which is pretty fitting for Wayv's brand after love talk ğŸ˜. I like the intro. It was kind of basic though the intro was not that distinct kind of basic in fact. As well as the phrase "I believe in miracles," when Ten said that in the beginning I thought this was going to be a clichÃ©/ cheese song, I was kind of repulse, but as the phrase transpired into the chorus with the Oh Na NA it was very hypnotic and catchy. Perhaps the reason behind why I perceived that was imparted that most fully English songs are pretty cringe predominantly since they do not translate the words and emotions correctly into english as the lyrics in English are often one dimensional and dull. But this song really is not like any of those songs this song fully encompassed the concept. There was emotion and great profiency of expression, except for the intro cause that was very obvious, it was sticking out like a sore thumb, that noticeable. Great song as always!

author: @gemrusfernandez9811
text:
I dunno why some czennies find it so hard to support WayV when they are literally just another unit of NCT. I mean I'm not even here for a long time, I just got into the fandom last year, although I've been lowkey supporting NCT dream,127 and U because I haven't heard about WayV before since I'm not an official stan, blame EXO HAHAHA

But anyways, everyone in NCT as a whole are all talented,visually amazing and super fun! I might even have to place WayV as the first place when it comes to being the funniest unit, all of em are just crackheads. 

And I also don't understand other czennies who start fandom wars between 127 and Dream. Like, wtf y'all doing? They're literally just in the same group, they all love and treasure each other. So please let us just support them equally and never make them feel like they are less than the other units coz when it comes to it, your fave idols from Dream,127 and WayV become one in NCT U, so y'all are just fighting a useless fight haha

author: @manassaya4739
text: I can't lie, I really love this unit a lot. Everyone in NCT are amazing. They're talented and charming. But personally, WayV is different! Their music is great! Every single WayV song you can find is in my playlist. Their smoothness is unbelievable! Stage performances, dance moves, vocals, raps, vibes, expressions, stylists, MVs and productions are magnificent. I can't wait to see their Miracle's dance practise. I bet it will be lit! This song is super dope, everyone looks amazing! But Ten in the centre is everything (every time he shows up blows up). Lucas and Winwin, we miss you!

text:
YES!! WAYV IN THE HOUSE!! THIS IS A BOP!!!!
For a moment when I heard the beat and then a voice rapping I thought SM had really gone and debuted Mark into WayV!!  Then I realized it was our baby YangYang spitting bars like fire!! Hendery also slayed his rap part!! Xiaojun sounding all angelic and Kun being his smooth self!! I need no words for Ten's flawless performance as usual! And Ten is rocking the turquoise/teal hair!! WayV dishing out the visuals!! The R&B fits WayV well. Of course WayV is not complete with LuWin's absence, but I am confident that the 5 remaining members will slay every performance!! Until their return WAYV FIGHTING!!!

author: @an1642
text:
i think rnb fits with wayv the most! i love their previous rnb songs like king of hearts, love talk, and only human. and this sounds so amazing as well!

hendery's rap as always sounds astonishing! yangyang also did a good job to pull those verses up. the smoothness in ten's vocal blended so well with the song. so is kun with his amazing voice and xiaojun be hitting those notes perfectly!!!

i also love the concept and the dance! the scribble and doddle thing, gives me kind of vibes. overall, it's a good track video. good job, wayv :D
